channel.title: Tools on David Araújo
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on David Araújo

item.title: Homeless Self Hosting
item.description: Table of contents As specific as it is simple I needed a coach All hail Apps Script The Architecture: No Server, No Problem The ‘Secret Sauce’: Gemini 2.5 Pro Conclusion: The Environment is the Message Project page Like usual, you can find all documents and code here Has specific as it is simple Link to heading In this cookie-cutter world, we have managed to make ourselves fit in whatever shape fits the majority.

item.title: Old But Gold
item.description: Table of contents Amazing is simple Simple isn’t basic Limitations On the shoulders of giants Quick and easy Project page Like usual, you can find all documents and code here So, before continuing, I must tell you the context of this post. I recently finished college (hurray for me!) and I started working for Cognizant doing Android Reverse Engineering for Google. Due to that, I got a whole new appreciation for what we’ll be discussing today.

item.title: Safety Glasses First
item.description: Table of contents Strong roots Vitualization is the name of the game Touch it with a stick Clean up and bleach Have Fun! I’m paranoid about safety. As much as I love getting my hands on that new, shiny, (un)known malicious application or scratching that itch of clicking on those sketchy phishing emails I tell myself only idiots click on, the one thing I love more is knowing that after I get bored doing it, my machine will not be infected and that little voice in my head won’t be telling me that I need to, again, nuke my disk and re-install my OS.
